CommonPopup_ObtEnd_Message:
Thank you very much for participating
in the open beta test.
Your play data from the beta cannot
be used in the official release, so we
ask that you please delete the app.

Once it's deleted, you can download
the app again from your app store
and start the game fresh.
CommonPopup_ObtFinishWaiting_Message:
The beta testing period has ended.
Please use the official app
once it is released.

Thank you for participating
in the open beta test.
